short_summary: Supply and delivery of qty 3 of Inflatable C130 Aircraft Maintenance Shelters
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
**Contract Title:** Acquisition of Inflatable C130 Aircraft Maintenance Shelters
**Contract Reference:** WS3261734381-Doc3558029479
**Contract NAICS Code:** 95141700 (Prefabricated Commercial and Industrial Buildings and Structures)

**Tender Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of inflatable C130 aircraft maintenance shelters to 19 Wing Comox, British Columbia. The contract calls for the delivery of three (3) shelters, with an option for up to three (3) additional units.

**Contract Duration:**

The expected contract start date is January 10, 2022, and the expected contract end date is March 31, 2024.

**Commerce and Trade Agreements:**

This tender opportunity may be subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Tender Requirements:**

* Respondents must provide a minimum of three (3) inflatable C130 aircraft maintenance shelters.
* Respondents must meet the specified delivery date and time.
* Respondents must meet the specified contract duration.

**Contracting Entity:**

The contracting entity for this tender opportunity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), represented by the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Contact Information:**

Christine Cress, 
christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
/end.

Please ensure that the rewritten entry includes the following elements:
* Contract title and reference number

* Contact information.  Don't forget to follow a clear and concise manner, fair and neutral tone, and avoid redundant terms. Don't try to reinvent the wheel. Stick with the basics.
